text: I can confidently say it was one of the best experiences I've had as a dog lover! From the moment I walked in, I was greeted by the warm and inviting atmosphere, complete with adorable dog-themed decor and the delightful sounds of happy pups playing.

A beautifully aesthetic and spacious dog caf√© with a warm, welcoming vibe! The owner is incredibly friendly and always takes the time to mingle with dog owners, making everyone feel at home. The space is airy, well-designed, and perfect for both pups and their humans to relax. The dogs absolutely love it here‚Äîit‚Äôs their little paradise! Highly recommend for a fun and stress-free outing with your furry friend.

What a gem of a pet cafe! The Venusology caf√© owners are super warm and super friendly. The food here is really good, and the service is excellent. The decor is so pretty and it‚Äôs totally worth a visit! They even have pet meals! So bring your pets here, enjoy the space and a lovely meal!

First time checking out this dog friendly cafe with our Cavapoo. Nice decor with stuffed toys and a small enclosed garden for dogs to run around in. Unfortunately it rained before we went so our dog was not keen to explore.
Foodwise, as I'm lactose intolerant, the choice was narrow. Also the menu was in a  small faded font which we couldn't read. Had to take photos and enlarge. Tried to find the menu online but not successful.
My single burger (no cheese) was covered with lots of sauces. Overall nice but I reacted badly to some ingredient and was spinning after half a burger. I do react to MSG or additives so could be 1 or the other.
Hubby had the cream spaghetti with chicken which he declared good.
The lady boss offered chicken liver treats to dogs but we didn't try as our dog has a sensitive stomach. The dog at the next time was very happy with it. In fact the white Spitz also had a dog meal which he finished in no time. Looked very healthy with fruits etc.
For the chill vibe, we may go again to have drinks and let the dog make friends, especially in sunny weather.
Otherwise, won't make a special trip up Phoenix Park.

Friendly owner and friendly staffs, lotsa of space for furkids to roam around freely, many photo spots. Ordered the A√ßai waffle which is üëç. Owner mentioned that they organised regular events for dogs which is great. Will come again if there is a chance.
